title: This Slack AI Personal Assistant is Better than a Real Person
description:
There is a time and place to code your own AI solutions and a time to not reinvent the wheel. A personal assistant in your favorite chat platform like Slack is a time to NOT reinvent the wheel when there are amazing platforms out there like Runbear that'll do just what you're looking for in minutes! And this assistant is honestly more helpful than a real person...

Artificial Intelligence is no doubt the future of not just software development but the whole world. And I'm on a mission to master it - focusing first on mastering AI Agents.

Join me as I push the limits of what is possible with AI. I'll be uploading videos at least two times a week - Sundays and Wednesdays at 7:00 PM CDT!
